Title: Aggregate
Abstract:
This algorithm take a vector or table layer and aggregate features based on a group by expression. Features for which group by expression return the same value are grouped together.

It is possible to group all source features together using constant value in group by parameter, example: NULL.

It is also possible to group features using multiple fields using Array function, example: Array("Field1", "Field2").

Geometries (if present) are combined into one multipart geometry for each group.

Output attributes are computed depending on each given aggregate definition.

Input.Abstract: Group by expression (NULL to group all features)

Accepted data types.list[dict]: list of aggregate definitions as dictionaries

Accepted data types.str: 'memory:' to store result in temporary memory layer
using vector provider ID prefix and destination URI, e.g. 'postgres:…' to store result in PostGIS table
